app.title: SEO Preview Tool - Google Search Results Preview
app.subtitle: Free Google search results preview tool to see how your website appears in SERP. Test meta descriptions and title tags with our SERP simulator.

form.title: Edit Your SERP Data
form.keywordsHelper: Keywords will be highlighted in bold in the preview

tips.title: Quick Tips:
tips.titleLimit: Keep titles under 60 characters and {{limit}}px width
tips.descriptionLimit: Keep descriptions under 160 characters and {{limit}}px width
tips.includeKeyword: Include your main keyword in the title

feedback.titleTooShort: Consider making your title more specific (30+ characters recommended)
feedback.titleTooLong: Title may be truncated in search results
feedback.titleNeedsKeyword: Including keywords in your title helps with SEO
feedback.descriptionTooShort: Consider adding more detail to your description (120+ characters recommended)
feedback.descriptionTooLong: Description may be truncated in search results
feedback.descriptionNeedsKeyword: Try naturally including keywords in your description

onboarding.helpTooltip: This tool helps you preview how your page will appear in Google search results

templates.title: Quick Start Templates
templates.subtitle: Click any template to instantly populate your SEO fields with industry-specific examples

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.description: These templates are optimized for different industries. Use them as starting points and customize to match your specific content and brand voice.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Product
ecommerce.title: Premium Wireless Headphones - Best Sound Quality 2025
ecommerce.description: Discover our top-rated wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio. Free shipping & 2-year warranty included.
ecommerce.keywords: wireless headphones, noise cancellation, premium audio, bluetooth headphones

business.name: Business Service
business.title: Digital Marketing Agency | SEO & PPC Experts | Grow Your Business
business.description: Transform your online presence with our expert digital marketing services. Specializing in SEO, PPC, and social media marketing. Get your free consultation today!
business.keywords: digital marketing, SEO services, PPC advertising, social media marketing

education.name: Educational Content
education.title: Learn Python Programming - Complete Beginner Course 2025
education.description: Master Python programming from scratch with our comprehensive course. Includes hands-on projects, real-world examples, and lifetime access. Start coding today!
education.keywords: python programming, coding course, programming tutorial, learn to code

health.name: Health & Wellness
health.title: 10 Science-Backed Ways to Boost Your Immune System Naturally
health.description: Discover proven methods to strengthen your immune system with natural approaches. Expert tips on nutrition, exercise, sleep, and lifestyle changes for better health.
health.keywords: immune system, natural health, wellness tips, healthy lifestyle

automotive.name: Automotive Review
automotive.title: 2025 Tesla Model 3 Review | Performance, Range & Features
automotive.description: Complete review of the 2025 Tesla Model 3 covering performance specs, driving range, interior features, and pricing. See why it's the top electric sedan.
automotive.keywords: Tesla Model 3, electric car review, EV performance, Tesla 2025

realestate.name: Real Estate Listing
realestate.title: Luxury 4BR Home for Sale | Downtown Location | $750K
realestate.description: Stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in prime downtown location. Features modern kitchen, hardwood floors, and private garden. Schedule your viewing today!
realestate.keywords: luxury home for sale, 4 bedroom house, downtown real estate, modern home

food.name: Food & Recipe
food.title: Easy 30-Minute Chicken Alfredo Recipe | Creamy & Delicious
food.description: Learn to make restaurant-quality chicken alfredo at home in just 30 minutes. This creamy, rich pasta dish uses simple ingredients for amazing results.
food.keywords: chicken alfredo recipe, easy pasta recipe, 30 minute meals, homemade alfredo

photography.name: Photography Service
photography.title: Professional Wedding Photography | Capture Your Perfect Day
photography.description: Award-winning wedding photographer specializing in natural, emotional moments. Serving the tri-state area with personalized packages and stunning results.
photography.keywords: wedding photography, professional photographer, wedding photos, bridal photography

issues.titleTooShort: Title is too short (less than 30 characters)
issues.titleNoKeywords: Title does not contain any target keywords
issues.titleNeedsMoreWords: Consider using more descriptive words in your title
issues.descriptionTooLong: Description may be truncated in search results (over {{maxLength}} characters)
issues.descriptionTooShort: Description is too short (less than {{minLength}} characters)
issues.descriptionNoKeywords: Description does not contain target keywords
issues.descriptionNeedsCta: Consider adding a call-to-action to your description
issues.urlTooLong: URL is quite long, consider shortening it
issues.urlUsesUnderscores: Consider using hyphens instead of underscores in URLs
issues.urlTooManyParams: URL has many parameters, consider using cleaner URLs
issues.tooManyKeywords: Too many keywords may dilute focus
issues.missingKeywordInTitle: Primary keyword '{{keyword}}' not found in title
issues.missingKeywordInDescription: Primary keyword '{{keyword}}' not found in description
issues.highKeywordDensity: Keyword density is too high ({{density}}%) - may be considered spam

recommendationsList.optimizeTitle: Keep title between 50-60 characters for better visibility
recommendationsList.includeKeywordInTitle: Include your main keyword in the title
recommendationsList.expandDescription: Expand your description to provide more context
recommendationsList.includeKeywordsInDescription: Consider including relevant keywords in the description
recommendationsList.addCallToAction: Add action words like 'Learn', 'Discover', or 'Get' to encourage clicks
recommendationsList.useHyphensInUrl: Use hyphens (-) instead of underscores (_) for better SEO
recommendationsList.addKeywords: Add relevant keywords to optimize your content
recommendationsList.focusOnMainKeywords: Focus on 3-5 main keywords for better results
recommendationsList.excellent: Great job! Your SEO looks strong
recommendationsList.goodFoundation: Good foundation, but there's room for improvement
recommendationsList.needsAttention: Several SEO issues need attention for better search visibility
recommendationsList.optimizeDescription: Keep description between 150-160 characters for optimal display
recommendationsList.includeKeywords: Include your primary keyword in both title and description
recommendationsList.improveReadability: Use shorter sentences and simpler words to improve readability
recommendationsList.useNumbers: Consider using numbers or statistics to make your title more compelling
recommendationsList.avoidKeywordStuffing: Reduce keyword density to avoid being flagged as spam
recommendationsList.fixUrl: Ensure your URL is properly formatted and accessible
